title: Senior Mobile iOS Developer
jobDescription:
Seeking a motivated, driven and hard-working, mobile iOS developer. It requires 5+ years of experience developing mobile iOS apps, good knowledge of network protocols like HTTP/S and Bluetooth and experience publishing apps on Apples AppStore. Very good knowledge and solid background on the iOS platform, ecosystem, APIs, services, features, packages, frameworks and networking technologies are expected. This includes good knowledge of low level APIs.

The successful candidate will be required to engage and interact with several areas within Nielsen including QA teams, Backend processing systems, Operations, product owners, Product managers and business partners from around the world. This position is expected to bring industry best practices in areas such as source control, code review, automated unit test to name a few, to the team

Responsibilities:

  • Design and develop code for Nielsen's iOS mobile digital and audio measurement applications
  • Help drive alignment between different teams and different mobile apps
  • Implement best practices across a team of developers and testers
  • Deliver efficient, quality software, excellent mobile performance and experience for our mobile app users
  • Drive mobile development and mentor junior team members
  • Stay on top of technology change, able to assess impact, able to offer solutions and innovate in the mobile measurement space
  • Deploy to Apple AppStore and monitor the Store stats for application health
  • Production support for the existing apps in the Store

Qualification:

Should be a solid iOS developer with minimum 5 years experience in designing and implementing solutions for mobile iOS devices (iPhones, iPads)

  • Excellent native iOS development experience
  • Excellent knowledge of Swift programming. Obj C is a plus
  • Very good knowledge and exposure to iOS networking APIs, specifically HTTP/S
  • Experience working with on-device Bluetooth protocols using the corresponding iOS APIs and services is strongly desired
  • Experience working with on-device VPN protocols using the corresponding iOS APIs and services is a plus
  • Proven experience working with different type of extensions (like notification, app extension, network extensions, etc.,)
  • Experience with Carthage, Cocoa pods, Swift package manager is a MUST
  • Experience working with Audio/Video recording in the background
  • Understanding of Native and Web communications using JavaScript
  • Experience with using Instrumentation and Profiling tools provided by XCode
  • Experience working with CoreData or Room DB
  • Good knowledge on memory management for mobile applications
  • Proven record on mobile performance optimization
  • Understanding of IPv4/IPv6, UDP/TCP packets and sockets is a plus
  • Any prior experience with ReactJS is a plus
  • Experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins/GITLab)
  • Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment and ceremonies
  • Good knowledge of JSON formats and parsers
  • Experience integrating 3rd party SDKs (e.g. Firebase)
  • Should have the ability to work independently and be a self-starter, always under the direction and support provided by the manager
  • Excellent communication and documentation skills
  • Commitment to excellence, accepting responsibility and accountability for results
  • Flexible to attempt alternate solutions to resolve issues and able adjust to a dynamic, changing technical and business environment

title: Mobile iOS & Android Developer
jobDescription:
About the Role

Seeking a solid and experienced mobile developer with both iOS and Android platform knowledge. This position requires a minimum 3 years of experience developing mobile iOS / Android apps and proven knowledge of network protocols like HTTP, HTTPS, VPN, Bluetooth. Strong knowledge of the Android platform and ecosystem, VPN and networking technologies is desired. In addition to development, this position will be helping shape the strategy for testing and deployment of our mobile apps across different markets. The successful candidate will be required to interact with other teams and work with product managers and business owners.


Responsibilities

  • Design and develop code for Nielsens mobile digital and audio measurement applications
  • Help drive alignment between different teams and different mobile apps
  • Implement best practices across a team of developers and testers
  • Deliver efficient, quality software, excellent mobile performance and experience for our mobile app users
  • Stay on top of technology change, able to assess impact, able to offer solutions and innovate in the mobile measurement space
  • Deploying to Google Play Store / Apple app store and monitoring the store stats for application health.
  • Production support for the existing app in the store

Key Skills

Should be an cross platform developer with minimum 3 yearsâ€™ experience in designing and implementing solutions for Android and iOS devices

  • Proven record of mobile app development
  • Excellent Java/Kotlin knowledge
  • Excellent Swift / Obj-C knowledge
  • Good knowledge of scripting languages
  • Very good knowledge and exposure to networking APIs, specifically HTTP/S
  • Very good knowledge on memory management for embedded applications
  • Working knowledge of Bluetooth and/or other IoT apps
  • Working knowledge and understanding of VPN support is a plus
  • Experience working with various Extensions & Kits offered by the iOS platform
  • Strong knowledge on Android Background & Foreground services is a MUST
  • Experience with ReactNative or ReactJS is a plus
  • Proven record on mobile performance optimization
  • Understanding of IPv4/IPv6, UDP/TCP packets and sockets is a plus
  • Understanding of Native and Web communications using JavaScript
  • Experience working with Audio/Video recording in the background
  • Experience working with JUnit 5 and Kotest, XCUnit
  • Experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins/GITLab)
  • Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment and ceremonies
  • Good knowledge of JSON formats and parsers
  • Experience integrating 3rd party SDKs (e.g. Firebase)
  • Should be able to work across multiple platforms and domains
  • Should have the ability to work independently and be a self-starter. Direction and support will be provided by the manager or the technical lead, but the candidate is expected to be a proactive leader and put forth his/her own ideas
  • Excellent communication, documentation and presentation skills
  • Commitment to excellence, accepting responsibility and accountability for results
  • Flexible to attempt alternate solutions to resolve issues and able adjust to a dynamic, changing technical and business environment

title: Mobile Application Developer
jobDescription:
We are looking for 3-6 years of experienced self-motivated Mobile Application Developer to join our core dynamic team.


Role & responsibilities

  • Ability to implement intuitive and responsive user interfaces for mobile devices and tablets on IOS and Android Platforms.
  • Proficient in React Native and Flutter-based development.
  • Proficient in Typescript and other Javascript technology.
  • Experience in integrating RESTful APIs, Integration with iOT devices, and Bluetooth-based communication.
  • Hands-on experience in using databases and offline development.
  • Well-versed with the usage of tools like JIRA, Confluence, Sonar, MPP, Visio, and Version Control System based on GIT.
  • Should be hands-on experience in some of the following use cases -Push Notifications, RealTime communication, Chat etc.
  • Well-versed in backend technologies like Python and NodeJS

Preferred candidate profile

  • A conscientious individual demonstrating attention to detail along with high levels of ownership and commitment.
  • Ability to take the initiative to research, learn, and recommend emerging technologies.
  • Strong exposure to development standards and quality processes.
  • Motivation to create high-quality products, and systems and learn new skills.
  • Mentor team members and responsible for the performance and quality of the team.
  • Proficient in English, both written and verbal
  • Good presentation skills
  • Should be able to provide solutions for the requirements in terms of design, and implementation.
  • Providing support whenever it required.
  • A good team player capable of delivering excellent results under pressure and to strict deadlines.
  • Ability to communicate effectively with clients
  • Quality focused
  • Adaptable and able to pick up new techniques

title: Application Developer: Mobile Android
tagsAndSkills: rest,performance tuning,android,unit testing,api,offline storage,android mobile application development,cloud message apis
jobDescription:
A career in IBM Consulting is rooted by long-term relationships and close collaboration with clients across the globe.
You'll work with visionaries across multiple industries to improve the hybrid cloud and AI journey for the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Your ability to accelerate impact and make meaningful change for your clients is enabled by our strategic partner ecosystem and our robust technology platforms across the IBM portfolio, including Software and Red Hat.
Curiosity and a constant quest for knowledge serve as the foundation to success in IBM Consulting. In your role, you'll be encouraged to challenge the norm, investigate ideas outside of your role, and come up with creative solutions resulting in ground breaking impact for a wide network of clients. Our culture of evolution and empathy centers on long-term career growth and development opportunities in an environment that embraces your unique skills and experience.

Your Role and Responsibilities
As an Application Developer, you will lead IBM into the future by translating system requirements into the design and development of customized systems in an agile environment. The success of IBM is in your hands as you transform vital business needs into code and drive innovation.
Your work will power IBM and its clients globally, collaborating and integrating code into enterprise systems. You will have access to the latest education, tools and technology, and a limitless career path with the world's technology leader. Come to IBM and make a global impact!
Your primary responsibilities include:
  • Envision how people experience products and bring that vision to life in a way that feels inspired, refined and magical
  • Tackle complex tasks and transform them into intuitive, accessible and easy-to-use designs for billions of customers around the world (novice to expert)
  • Collaborate with researchers, engineers, and product managers throughout design process - from creating research protocols, personas, scenarios, information architecture and wireframes to building user interface prototypes


Required Technical and Professional Expertise
  • Proven knowledge of Android SDK, different versions of Android, and how to deal with different screen sizes
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services
  • Proven knowledge of Android UI design principles, patterns, and best practices
  • Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning


Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise
  • Ability to design/develop/support new/existing apps, and perform unit testing and integration testing
  • Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
  • Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
